biotools.summary:
Accurate detection of all SV types through whole-genome alignment.

MUM&Co is a simple bash script that uses Whole Genome Alignment information provided by MUMmer (v3 and v4) to detect variants.

Deletions (novel and mobile), insertions (novel and mobile) and tandem duplications (>50bp).

bioschemas.name: MUM
